snippet.title: Sclash trailer - AGFD 2022
snippet.description:
STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1284130/Sclash/
GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/sclash

_________________________________________________________________________

Sclash is a tense 2D plug’n play samurai dueling game where battles are won with a single swing of the blade


Play as a battle-hardened samurai and fight epic duels where each move counts. Manage your stamina wisely, pace yourself, and strike at the right moment to land a deadly hit.

True to the solemn decorum of samurai duels, fights leave you time to strategize and plan your attack while you measure your opponent. Stamina is your main resource during the fight: feel the pressure rise as your stamina depletes with every move you make! 

Easy to pick up & plug’n play, no loading times, fight your friends of all levels in short duels with a beautiful painterly style and hand-drawn samurai!

_________________________________________________________________________

DEVELOPER: Bevel Bakery
With the partnership of ABIDING BRIDGE: https://abidingbridge.com/
_________________________________________________________________________

TWITTER: https://twitter.com/SclashTheGame
INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/sclashthegame/
LINKS: https://linktr.ee/sclash
WEBSITE: https://sclashthegame.com/en/
